text: The Monsterverse is an action-adventure monster movie franchise featuring Godzilla and King Kong, produced by Warner Bros. Pictures and Legendary Pictures. The franchise started with Godzilla (2014) which acted as a reboot to the Godzilla franchise. It was followed by Kong: Skull Island (2017), Godzilla: King of the Monsters (2019), Godzilla vs. Kong (2021) and Godzilla X Kong: The New Empire (2024). == Movies == Movie U.S. release date Director Screenwriter(s) Story by Producers Godzilla Gareth Edwards Max Borenstein David Callaham Thomas Tull, Jon Jashni, Mary Parent and Brian Rogers Kong: Skull Island Jordan Vogt-Roberts Dan Gilroy and Max Borenstein and Derek Connolly John Gatins Thomas Tull, Jon Jashni, Mary Parent and Alex Garcia Godzilla: King of the Monsters Michael Dougherty Michael Dougherty & Zach Shields Max Borenstein and Michael Dougherty & Zach Shields Thomas Tull, Jon Jashni, Mary Parent, Alex Garcia and Brian Rogers Godzilla vs. Kong Adam Wingard Eric Pearson and Max Borenstein Terry Rossio and Michael Dougherty & Zach Shields Thomas Tull, Jon Jashni, Brian Rogers, Mary Parent, Alex Garcia and Eric McLeod Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire Terry Rossio and Simon Barrett and Jeremy Slater Terry Rossio & Adam Wingard & Simon Barrett ==Cast and characters== Character Films Godzilla Kong: Skull Island Godzilla: King of the Monsters Godzilla vs. Kong Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire Monsters Godzilla T.J.
